# getting started {#intro}

The idea behind this book is to make it easier to start learning data science concepts as well as use them in a practical real world setting.
if you follow the items on the list sequentially you should be able to obtain a general knowledge of data science the way it is used for chucks purposes. 

1. Github organization
2. Basic R
    + Intro to R
    + Starting with data
    + Manipulating data basics
3. Indeterminate R
    + Tidyverse
    + Dplyr basics
    + Tibbles
    + Tidy Data With Tidyr
4. Data Visualization 
    + ggplot
    + 
5. Kinda Advanced
    + Relational Data With Dplyr
    + stringr
